org.openimaj.image

Class Plotter<Q,I extends Image<Q,I>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.Plotter<Q,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    Q - The pixel type that is processed
    I - The image type that is processed

    public class Plotter<Q,I extends Image<Q,I>>
extends Object
    A simple 2d plotter
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Plotter

        public Plotter(I image)
        Construct a plotter that writes to the given image. The pen colour is set to the value of the pixel at (0,0) and the pen thickness is set to 1.
        Parameters:
        image - the image

      • Plotter

        public Plotter(I image,
               Q colour)
        Construct a plotter that writes to the given image with the given initial pen colour. The pen thickness is set to 1.
        Parameters:
        image - the image
        colour - the pen colour

      • Plotter

        public Plotter(I image,
               Q colour,
               int thickness)
        Construct a plotter that writes to the given image.
        Parameters:
        image - the image
        colour - the pen colour
        thickness - the pen thickness
